file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: "API"
  version: "1.0.0"
  contact:
    name: Starkina Maria
    email: starkina@surfstudio.ru

components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT 

security:
  - bearerAuth: []

paths:
  /messages/unreadMessages:
    get:
      summary: Количество непрочитанных сообщений пользователя
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Все ок"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/UnreadMessages"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

  /messages:
    get:
      summary: Список сообщений пользователя. Тут приходят полные сообщения (вместе с детальным представлением)
      parameters:
        - $ref: "../common/resources/models.yaml#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "../common/resources/models.yaml#/components/parameters/offset"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Все ок"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/MessagesResponse"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"
          
  /messages/{id}:
    parameters:
      - name: id
        required: true
        in: path
        schema:
          type: string     
    put:
      summary: Отмечаем сообщение как прочитанное
      responses:
        "204":
          description: "Сообщение прочитано"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"
    delete:
      summary: Удаляем сообщение
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "Все ок"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "../common/models.yaml#/components/schemas/InfoMessage"
        default:
          $ref: "../common/errors.yaml#/components/responses/ApiErrorResponse"

Error: parse: paths: /messages: get: : parameters: parse parameter "": resolve "../common/resources/models.yaml#/components/parameters/limit" reference: invalid parameter reference: "../common/resources/models.yaml#/components/parameters/limit"
